outputs.output_descr: The focus of the project is to further develop both the understanding of DRR and climate risk management (CRM); and the capacities to implement DRR programs, primarily through considerations related to the development of a National Disaster Risk Reduction Policy, and the formulation of DRR operational guidelines. The direct beneficiaries of the project will be the local communities who bear the brunt of disasters, especially vulnerable women. The Indirect benefits will accrue to Local Government departments, Government line ministries, the UNDP country office, UN agencies and the Department of Disaster Management Affairs and its counterparts.
